@Birdeye19 @thedailyhodl @JoelKatz Of course, but they mean cloning (fork of the code), not forking the existing xrp blockchain.  Xlm (stellar) is a clone of xrp, so is CSC (casinocoin).  Forking the xrp blockchain (like Bitcoin gold is a fork of Bitcoin's blockchain) is extremely unlikely for xrp
